definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The virus has such high infectivity that it soon spread to the whole area.
sentences.chinese: 這病毒傳染性如此強，不久就傳遍整個地區。

sentences.english: Distrust can be contagious. But, so can trust. (Robbins Stacia, British writer.
sentences.chinese: 不信任有傳染性，但是不信任也如此。

sentences.english: There were no differences in noninfectious complications or in mortality.
sentences.chinese: 非傳染性併發症和死亡率未見差異。

sentences.english: Objeective To summarize the clinical of infectious mononucleosis(IM) in adult patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析傳染性單核細胞增多症的臨牀特徵及治療。

sentences.english: All age groups and all regions are affected by NCDs.
sentences.chinese: 所有年齡組以及所有區域都受到非傳染性疾病的影響。

sentences.english: We also know that yawning is contagious or catching.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道打哈欠是有傳染性的或者易傳染。

sentences.english: What are the socioeconomic impacts of NCDs?
sentences.chinese: 非傳染性疾病造成的社會經濟影響如何？

sentences.english: The infectious serositis of duck is named Riemerella anatipestifer infection also .
sentences.chinese: 鴨傳染性漿膜炎又稱鴨疫裏默桿菌病。

sentences.english: Developing nations have always had to contend with infectious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 發展中國家常常要與傳染性疾病作鬥爭。

sentences.english: The root causes of NCDs reside in non-health sectors.
sentences.chinese: 非傳染性疾病的根源在於非衛生部門。

sentences.english: Strong infectiousness of mother is an important factor in intrauterine infection.
sentences.chinese: 母親傳染性強是宮內感染的重要因素。

sentences.english: To some extent, it can also reduce a carrier's contagiousness.
sentences.chinese: 甚至還有可能減少病毒攜帶者的傳染性。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the clinical characteristics of infectious mononucleosis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結兒童傳染性單核細胞增多症的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: The relationship between natural disasters and communicable diseases is frequently misconstrued.
sentences.chinese: 人們常常會誤解自然災害與傳染性疾病之間的關係。

sentences.english: He had an ear infection that made him stone deaf.
sentences.chinese: 他得過傳染性耳疾，以致耳朵全聾了。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)

pinyin: zi4 ti3 mian3 yi4 ji2 bing4

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
